gamecontrollers

类 RiskGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamecontrollers.RiskGameController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RiskGameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Class acting as the RiskGameView's controller, to define action performed according to different users' action.
